txt.en: Bósi believes another of Gorothúl's relics may be found at the bottom of Nalâ-dûm, where the great wheels of Khazad-dûm lie dormant.

'My uncle Bósi sent word while you were out. He thinks he knows where another of Gorothúl's relics may be found, and the location is just as dangerous as Lumul-nar, if not more so: the Water-wheels of Nalâ-dûm.

'Travel to the Chamber of the Cross-roads with your allies and speak with my uncle to learn more about Nalâ-dûm.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest is a Solo version of the dungeon that can be attempted if you have completed a version of Chapter 4: A Relic in Nalâ-dûm.</rgb>'
Bósi is in the Chamber of the Cross-roads, located off Durin's Way.\n\nBróin has told you to speak with his uncle about the Water-wheels of Nalâ-dûm.

'Greetings again to you, [placeholder]! I did not have the opportunity to properly thank you for helping to broker this alliance between the Iron Garrison and the Elves of Lothlórien. So I thank you! In Mazog, we have a prisoner worthy of exchanging for those Gorothúl brought to Dol Guldur: my son chief among them. O Bori! Be strong and courageous during your torment!

'Scouts report seeing a relic of unquestionable evil among the Water-wheels of Nalâ-dûm, but were unable to route the flow of the canals in such a way as to reach it. You must determine the proper workings of the system if you are to find and destroy this relic of Gorothúl's.

'I shall have a scout lead you to the entrance of Nalâ-dûm in the Water-works. Delving into the flooded deeps will be dangerous, for the mechanisms are very old and have not been used for many years.'

The entrance to Nalâ-dûm can be found in the Water-works of Moria.\n\nBósi reports that a relic of Gorothúl's lies among the Water-wheels of Nalâ-dûm and will require careful usage of the mechanisms to reach and destroy.

Bósi is in the Chamber of the Cross-roads, located off Durin's Way.

You have destroyed the relic left in Nalâ-dûm by Gorothúl and should report your success to Bósi.

You have destroyed the relic Gorothúl gave to the merrevail in Lumul-nar and should return now to Bróin.
'The entrance to Nalâ-dûm lies in the Water-works. I shall send a guide to lead you to the entrance.\n\n'Are you ready to journey forth?'
'Very well-done, [placeholder]. The destruction of that relic should keep further evils from being drawn to the Water-wheels.\n\n'Now we must look to the future.'

'My uncle Bósi thinks he knows where another of Gorothúl's relics may be found: among the Water-wheels of Nalâ-dûm.\n\n'Go speak to him in the Chamber of the Cross-roads, off Durin's Way, and he will tell you more about Nalâ-dûm.'
Talk to Bósi in the Chamber of the Cross-roads
Talk to Bósi and travel to Water-works of Nalâ-dûm
Talk to Bósi in the Chamber of the Cross-roads
